Trade/Device Name(s): U-RIGHT TD-4227 No Coding Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): U-RIGHT TD-4227 No Coding Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for U-RIGHT TD-4227 No Coding Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of blood glucose using electrochemical method
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites for monitoring diabetes control by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes mellitus at home; not for diagnosis or screening or use on neonates
